title: The Dead Men Grin
description: Ben Helm, Crack New York Detective, versus an unknown killer who terrorizes the sleepy town of Trevan with a trio of shocking murders. This is the thread of The Dead Men Grin, a horrifying story so skillfully plotted that it golds you breathless throughout. WHo set the mysterious that claimed the life of Ben's beautiful cousin? What is the gruesome clue in the grinning faces of the two bodies Ben discovers in a nearby swamp? And why is Ben's own family united against him in a strange conspiracy of silence? Time runs out fast as Ben finds himself next on the killer's list, and springs his showdown trap in one last-minute desperate gamble.
author: Bruno Fischer
